name: 1.3.0.Final
body:
- [**Task**] Move integration tests into a separate workflow triggered only on changes to `master` [#771](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/771)
- [**Duplicate**] Add indentation/newlines to Info Tab for Schema [#765](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/765)
- [**Discussion**] In Kafka-Connect scenario, the same schema is updated (PUT) in the registry for each table row [#734](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/734)
- [**Task**] Add a step to the release workflow to send a tweet [#732](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/732)
- [**Task**] Verify/test that docker images were pushed to docker hub (release workflow) [#731](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/731)
- [**Discussion**][**Task**] Test that deploy to maven central succeeded (release workflow) [#730](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/730)
- [**Enhancement**] Update the release workflow to allow maven central deploy retries [#729](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/729)
- [**Task**] Add comments to project.yaml for clarity [#728](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/728)
- [**Discussion**][**Enhancement**] Transitioning from `DEPRECATED` state? [#722](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/722)
- [**Discussion**][**Enhancement**] How to add user-defined artifact metadata? [#720](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/720)
- [**invalid**] apicurio-registry-maven-plugin:register fails with 405 response [#686](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/686)
- [**Duplicate**] Format and indent JSON schemas [#684](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/684)
- [**Enhancement**] Replace the current generated API Client with a custom one [#672](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/672)
- [**Enhancement**][**UI**] Add option in "Content" tab of UI to format content [#649](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/649)
- [**Bug**] ui - Error searching for artifacts [#513](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/513)
- [**invalid**] Create Indexing Client for ISPN storage [#222](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/222)
- [**invalid**] Create Indexing Client for JPA storage [#221](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/221)
